website_summaries.verdict: The gunmetal design and unique face of this watch put it somewhere between adventurous and classy.
pros: Has a more industrial look than most MVMT watches
Dual time zone display and date window
Available with a variety of straps, including metal mesh, leather, and fabric
cons: Customers have expressed durability concerns about the crystal

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: MVMT makes a value proposition that you don't have to break the bank for a great q quality watch. I selected this watch based on that proposition, and the black and rose gold was a great combination. Very happy with the purchase. Feels and looks like a quality item, and mesh band is comfortable and simple to adjust. MVMT is a brand I will continue to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: beautiful yet masculine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a one year anniversary present for my bf. He LOVED IT. I was iffy about the rose gold, and hoped he wouldn't find it feminine. He didn't and said it's very elegant. The color combo is really gorgeous in person. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking watch, not so nice watchband, winding knob irritates
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking low cost watch. The watchband was it's biggest detractor. It's bulky, weird looking and looks like it's made out of some kind of plastic meant to mimic leather. After receiving the watch and wearing it for a day, I went back to MVMT and ordered a replacement gray mesh metal watchband. Much better. The other issue that I've noticed is that, at least on my wrist, the winding knob rubs and irritates the back of my hand. I need to ensure that the watch is always pushed up on my wrist in order to avoid this.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Powers

customer_reviews.title: WTH?
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the most beautiful watch I have ever owned. But it has lost a half hour every two weeks so far. Thinking of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Brown

customer_reviews.title: Misleading photo representation
customer_reviews.text: The band on the camo voyager appeared to have a dark/black camo pattern. The actual watch I received has a more brown and tan colored camo pattern. I attached a photo of the advertised camo band to compare to what the band actually looks like. They are nothing alike. I have tried to reach out for returns and I have not heard back from the seller on here or their website. Now I am stuck with a watch that I will not wear. Just sharing my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: P.O.S. Junk
customer_reviews.text: P.O.S!!! I wore this 4 times, crystal broke. I can send it back and fix it at my cost. Better quality from Wal Mart This would be the perfect watch if all you do is model the watches you buy. For people that actually have to wear them on the daily, don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this handsome watch as a gift for a great friend that has earned his master's. And after getting to work the following Monday. Had to hear the disappointing news. The watch had a dead battery. And he had to go pay $15.00 for a new battery. Not good business.
customer_reviews.author: tammy koepnick

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality watch and way overpriced. You're paying for a brand and marketing.
customer_reviews.text: The band was super cheap feeling. The overall construction was very poor quality. I did my research after my purchase and found this same watch on Alibaba for $10. You're paying for marketing with this watch. The packaging alone probably cost more than the actual watch itself.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: Nice look horrible durability
customer_reviews.text: It's frustrating when ome reads reviews and makes a purchase all to find out that the product is not quality. 8 times I wore this watch...went to put it on this morning and the crystal face was cracked all the way across. I even installed a high end crystal guard to protect the face....now it looks like I am stuck with a hunk of junk. Just want to return and get reimbursed.
customer_reviews.author: Real_opinion

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and well designed.
customer_reviews.text: Stylish. My husband is a simple guy who likes simple, well-made things He LOVES this watch. He gets compliments every time he wears it.
customer_reviews.author: Danniegirl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Very clean watch. And the price is excellent. I do plan to make additional watch purchases from MVMT, but before I do I want to wear it for a period of time. The stick point there is that my wife won't let me have it until Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Watch
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch but no happy with the clasp seems kind of flimsy and cant see the hands in the dark. They should have glow in the dark hands. Its not waterproof its water resistant so don't go in the pool with this watch.
customer_reviews.author: SMB

customer_reviews.title: The world is your oyster
customer_reviews.text: This watch is a game changer. It turns heads and captures the attention of even the most lethargic observer. With this watch, the world is your oyster. When you walk into a room with this watch on, you will feel like a strapping Wookiee among a pack of chihuahuas.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my fiancé when we got engaged and he loves it! And it looks great on him! It’s been 5 months and the leather band is pretty stiff and discolored from sweat.. could be his fault for wearing it on hikes and while he works out..
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Better Than My Old $400 Watch
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this watch and it keeps very accurate time - to the second even after a month! I will definitely continue to buy MVMT watches. I used to have a $400 watch and like this one better.
customer_reviews.author: Chadd Zivic

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Only gave it a 4 because the band is a little bulky and you have to fold it back in which takes it toll on the band.
customer_reviews.author: Hans

customer_reviews.title: buckle can be better
customer_reviews.text: To be frank, I wasn't too thrilled with the watch. The face was nice, but the buckle part was weird. I gifted it to a friend and felt kind of embarrassed when he tried putting it on if I knew that's how the buckle looked I wouldn't have bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Riva

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive colour combination
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive, im glad i bought it. Its still new and i havent worn it long enough for the best description, but for now i have no regrets. The foldable part of the belt might be suspectible to early wear&tear, just keep that in mind
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but bulky.
customer_reviews.text: Watch is great style. Bought for my husband. He liked the style except that the clasp was very bulky and visible on the side of his arm. He ended up returning.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: A good watch for young and old  !!
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my grandson he's 22 years open and he loves his watch this is the second watch that I bought for him and he said that is a very good watch! If he's happy I'm happy too! I give the a good rating! Wonderful watch!!
customer_reviews.author: Martha c colon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Watch band fastener keeps coming loose. Time runs slow. Screen hard to see. I'm very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing brand!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is beautiful it looks great, great quality, great presentation very simple, love the packaging as well
customer_reviews.author: Fbort

customer_reviews.title: Unsightly Wrist Strap
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the strap at all. Makes watch look very bulky and awkward. The style of the strap is to tuck the leather back into the band, does not make for an appealing look. Returned and purchased watch with metal band.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2nd MVMT watch and as good as the first
customer_reviews.text: These watches are simple yet elegant. Love the different styles they have.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Horning

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a S.O. he loved it. It's not hard to clasp like some of the reviews say, he does it in the dark everyday and never had and issue. The battery barely lasted a year, but aside from that it's a beautiful watch!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome looking watch
customer_reviews.text: I get lots of compliments on this watch! My only complaint will be after wearing it for a month, the face is a small scratch in it. Would like to see a more scratch resistant face.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Archer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Only the band could be better if they make double band, but after all I love it, got a lot compliments when I wore it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this watch. It is everything that I expected. I will be buying a different style really soon. Great company!!
customer_reviews.author: marcel simon

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, band not so much
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the watch, however I’m not very fond of the band, if I can get one that’s not so bulky around the dial, and adjustable it would be 5 star for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this company, I have a few of their watches and always get complimented when I wear them out.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: High end watch for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels great. I’ll be buying more MVMT watches.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Tirrel

customer_reviews.title: Only downfall is getting the watch to stay together
customer_reviews.text: Watch looks great but it’s difficult to clamp the watch. It feels rather flimsy as well when clamped together
customer_reviews.author: Juan Santana

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift to my son. He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Lea S.

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. Feels well built and is keeping time very well. Looks great also.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Blattel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift to a friend. He likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Temz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for any man who loves watches! Great addition to any collection!
customer_reviews.author: venessa s.

customer_reviews.title: Cool watch
customer_reviews.text: Thought the band would be a bit more durable but picture reflects watch
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Savarese

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the pictures
customer_reviews.text: This product arrives on time and it looks great. I would definitely recommend purchasing this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to read
customer_reviews.text: Can be very difficult to read, especially in low light
customer_reviews.author: Robert I Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a great watch that looks so great, and doesn't cost a ton.
customer_reviews.author: BRouse

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly like advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product was a gift. It was everything and more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical
customer_reviews.text: I usually order direct from MVMT but procrastinated on the watch for fathers day. I honestly just couldn't decide. I'm indifferent, I'm going to let my hubs decide If he wants to keep it. I looked at MVMT's insta for pics of this particular watch and it look looked alot larger than what I received. I will post pics tmrw once my hubs opens it. Overall looks great just small diameter than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Product is nice. Watch box sucks.
customer_reviews.text: Used this as a gift. Disliked the box. Box was cheap and flimsy so I couldn’t use the original box for gift giving.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Wallace

product_meta.title: MVMT Men's Analog Minimalist Watch with Dual Time Zones
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :6.9 x 3.6 x 1.65 inches; 11.85 Ounces
 * Department :Men
 * Date First Available :October 8, 2018
 * Manufacturer :MVMT
 * ASIN :B07J5PB347

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #177,096 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #1179 inMen's Wrist Watches 
    *  #47598 inMen's Shops 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars199 ratings
feature_bullets: MVMT Voyager men's minimalist watches are designed for the adventurous; featuring two dual time zone sub dials in a 42 MM diameter case
This analog watch features a bold grey dial encased in a matte smoke stainless steel case accented with gunmetal hands and markers; the grey stainless steel mesh strap is interchangeable
battery-powered 5 hand Miyota Quartz provides reliable and sophisticated movement
The glass case is made from hardened mineral crystal for enhanced durability; the Voyager is water resistant up to 10 ATM/100 Meters; perfect for carefree everyday use, but do not submerge in water
This Voyager analog watch was designed at our headquarters in Los Angeles, CA; we're confident you'll love your MVMT watch, so we offer a two-year guarantee on everything we design
